column4: I have multiple video files that are about 500mb(I don't know if size matters), I want to know if I can make them to an ISO(if so, how do I do this)? Once from an ISO, can I convert an ISO to an ISO DVD using Devede?
you can use dvdflick to make video files into playable dvds
you're right I thought they had a gnome version of it, sorry :(
